titleInfo.title: W. T. C. B. I. Country Jamboree at Ft. Homer W Hesterly Armory

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this file, contact print@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite image information in email.
mods.abstract: Two color half sheet (red and black on white) announcing the WTCBI Country Jamboree with Red Sovine, Bonnie Lee, Dave Dudley, Kitty Wells, and Johnny and Bobby Wright at the Fort Homer West Hesterly Armory on November 24, 25, 26, and 27. Poster features metal photoplates of Red Sovine, Dave Duddley, Kitty Wells, and Johnny Wright.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
